node.title: Come Out! - Raising Lazarus, Part 3
node.description:
Was it an act of divine mercy or an act of unbelievable cruelty? When Jesus brought Lazarus forth from the grave, I mean.

It all depends on your understanding of death. In this message Pastor Clark reviews the principles of Biblical interpretation, and reminds us that although the story of the resurrection in Bethany may not be the clearest evidence of the state of man in death, Lazarus’ raising definitely underscores the Bible’s teachings elsewhere.
